item.description:
The first gala went beyond fantastic. We had so much fun, we thought we'd do it again. Our next gala is sure to out do the last. I encourage you to rsvp early as we have limited characters available. You cannot rsvp maybe.

So put on your crazy outfits and step out of reality for a while and let go of your worries.
There will be prizes awarded for best costume, best sleuth, best actor/actress.
Lori Larsen

The Fee is $25 so contact Lori at 203-933-2200 or in the Members section
for registration and pament.

Being from West Haven, I am aware of the parking

Problems on Campbell Avenue.

I am also aware of parking areas

That others might not be aware of or use.

Most of the time, I use the large parking area that is behind

Lori's store. I was using that parking area over a decade ago

Long before Lori even moved into that store.


On Campbell Avenue, turn into the side street

Of Curtis Place next to

Marc Anthony's Pizza Italian Restaurant

(Restaurant has had a few different names over the years

But this is it's latest name.).

There is a large parking area behind there.

Going to Campbell Avenue, you can walk over towards

Marc Anthony's.

Then turn right on Campbell Avenue to Lori's store.

I walk over toward the right from the parking lot.

There is an alley between the buildings.

On Campbell Avenue, I turn left. Lori's store is a few stores in.

This should be a fun Meet Up.

http://www.lookatmeno...

www.lookatmenow22.com/

http://www.catchaheal...

www.catchahealthyhabit.com/

Mike
item.how_to_find_us: Lori Larsen is POC. Ask for Lori.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: Unknown Zone Plays Murder Mystery Gala 2 on Dec. 5
